gauss_markov.units: Prn is the sigma value of the continuous-time Gauss Markov (GM) Process, in [ppm]. Tau is the GM time constant in [sec], if null, then resorts to Random Walk

random_constant.units: std is the standard deviation of the discrete random constant process, in [ppm]

constant.units: val is the value of the constant bias of the process, in [ppm]

constant.units: val is the value of the constant bias of the process, in [ppm]
val is the value of the constant bias of the process, in [ppm]

white_noise.units: std is the continuous-time standard deviation of the white-noise process, in [(micro g) / sqrt(Hz)]
